means: 巡逻，巡查（patrol的现在分词形式）

sentence.Network_en: Police were periodically patrolling the area.
sentence.Network_cn: 警察定时在这一地区巡逻。

sentence.Network_en: We have been patrolling for days but have seen nothing.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们巡查多日却什么也没发现.

sentence.Network_en: Police are patrolling the major approach roads to the stadium.
sentence.Network_cn: 警察正在通往运动场的主要道路上巡逻.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语幽默故事_李玲于翠莲_新浪博客 ... warehouse： 仓库；货栈；大商店 patrolling: 巡逻模式 pumpkin: 南瓜.
the police patrolling about make people feel secure ., 警察来往巡逻使人们觉得安全.
Management of Pipeline Patrolling.管道巡线工作的管理。
patrolfrigate 巡逻护卫舰, patrolling 巡回的, patroller 巡逻机

list.abs: 巡逻艇(Patrol boat)是以重机枪为主要武器,用于近海作战的小型战斗舰艇。可担负巡逻、警戒、布雷等任务。许多国家甚至不以配备于军队,而是准军事的海岸巡逻队或警察.
PC代表什么_百度知道 ... =Padding Condenser 垫整[微调]电容器; Patrol Car, 巡逻车 PC 也是“警察”的缩写.
肖特 S.25 桑德兰（英语：Short S.25 Sunderland）是英国的水上飞机巡逻轰炸机（patrol bomber），是由肖特兄弟公司为英国皇家 …
中菲黄岩岛争端词汇盘点 ... 渔船 fishing boat 巡逻舰 patrol ship 泻湖 lagoon.

entry.def: When soldiers, police, or guards patrol an area or building, they move around it in order to make sure that there is no trouble there.

example.ex: Prison officers continued to patrol the grounds within the jail.

entry.def: Soldiers, police, or guards who are on patrol are patrolling an area.

example.ex: The army is now on patrol in Srinagar and a curfew has been imposed...
example.tran: 军队目前在斯利那加巡逻，且已实行了宵禁。

example.ex: Security forces remained on patrol until late into the night.
example.tran: 保安部队继续巡逻至深夜。

entry.def: A patrol is a group of soldiers or vehicles that are patrolling an area.

example.ex: Guerrillas attacked a patrol with hand grenades.
example.tran: 游击队用手榴弹袭击了巡逻队。

example.ex: ...a border patrol operating near the Burmese frontier.
example.tran: 在缅甸边界巡逻的边境巡逻队

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The force said officers would continue patrolling the streets.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Stick-wielding Maoist cadres can be seen patrolling for violators.

auth_sentence.res_content: International naval forces are patrolling the waters near Somalia.
